Unitron:



Unitron transformed into biped mode as Megatron dodged the missile and then 
came at him.  All Unitron could think to do wtih follow his example and flew 
at him with a shoulder outward, and if the course remained the same his 
shoulder would collide with Megatron's chin.

"I'm no ordinary Decepticon warrior, Rodimus."
